alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:03AM EDT until April 01 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Northeastern Adams County in northeastern Indiana... Southern Putnam County in west central Ohio... Van Wert County in west central Ohio... Allen County in west central Ohio... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1203 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Monroeville to near Bluffton to 10 miles northeast of Montpelier, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lima, Van Wert, Decatur, Delphos, Ottawa, Bluffton, Berne, Fort Shawnee, Spencerville, Columbus Grove, Elida, Kalida, Monroeville, Pandora, Convoy, Ottoville, Monroe, Ohio City, Spencerville In Allen County and Middlebury. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 141. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio.
